summary: This mod adds craftable & enchantable Golden & Silver Earrings for Females & Males of all Elf-races and Orcs to your game.
descriptionHtml:
Name: HN66s Earrings for Humans & Elves & Orcs
( http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/downloads/file.php?id=11130 )
*HN66s Earrings for females & males of humans, Elf-races and Orcs*
Version: 1.5
Date: 06-22-2012
Category: Armor
Requirements: Skyrim
Author: Humannature66
*********************************************************************************

... DESCRIPTION ...


This is what you get on version 1.5:
========================================
This mod adds some Golden & Silver Earrings for females & males of all Human-Races, Elf-races and Orcs to your game.

You get bothsided Creolas & multiple Clamps, in gold, silver & ancient silver;
These Creolas and Clamps can be enchanted and equipped separately, and they can be worn by females and males of all Elf-races and Orcs, and they are lorefriendly imo.

For the Kajit and Argonians: sorry folks, but looking at you while wearing earrings would remind me too much of a pelt- or CrocoLeather-bag ... >;D 




How you can get them:
=====================
You find some sets in each of your player\'s homes in Whiterun & Solitude, in the bedroom, in a small chest at the wall, besides the bed.
Also all Earrings can be crafted on any smithing forge, using silver & gold ingots.


Install of this mod
===================

INFO: the files of the old version of this mod can be deleted, they are no longer used by the esp.

1. Extract the files to a temporary location.

2. create the required folder structure, as you find it in this mod-pack.

3. Copy the contents into the designated folders:

>> the esp <<
...data\\Earrings Set1.esp

>> the meshes <<
...data\\meshes\\Armor\\HN66\\Earrings\\Earrings F CLAMPS GoL.nif
...data\\meshes\\Armor\\HN66\\Earrings\\Earrings F CLAMPS SiL ANC.nif
...data\\meshes\\Armor\\HN66\\Earrings\\Earrings F CLAMPS SiL.nif
...data\\meshes\\Armor\\HN66\\Earrings\\Earrings F CREOLAS GoL.nif
...data\\meshes\\Armor\\HN66\\Earrings\\Earrings F CREOLAS SiL ANC.nif
...data\\meshes\\Armor\\HN66\\Earrings\\Earrings F CREOLAS SiL.nif
...data\\meshes\\Armor\\HN66\\Earrings\\Earrings F DaElf CLAMPS GoL.nif
...data\\meshes\\Armor\\HN66\\Earrings\\Earrings F DaElf CLAMPS SiL ANC.nif
...data\\meshes\\Armor\\HN66\\Earrings\\Earrings F DaElf CLAMPS SiL.nif
...data\\meshes\\Armor\\HN66\\Earrings\\Earrings F DaElf CREOLAS GoL.nif
...data\\meshes\\Armor\\HN66\\Earrings\\Earrings F DaElf CREOLAS SiL ANC.nif
...data\\meshes\\Armor\\HN66\\Earrings\\Earrings F DaElf CREOLAS SiL.nif
...data\\meshes\\Armor\\HN66\\Earrings\\Earrings F HiElf CLAMPS GoL.nif
...data\\meshes\\Armor\\HN66\\Earrings\\Earrings F HiElf CLAMPS SiL ANC.nif
...data\\meshes\\Armor\\HN66\\Earrings\\Earrings F HiElf CLAMPS SiL.nif
...data\\meshes\\Armor\\HN66\\Earrings\\Earrings F HiElf CREOLAS GoL.nif
...data\\meshes\\Armor\\HN66\\Earrings\\Earrings F HiElf CREOLAS SiL ANC.nif
...data\\meshes\\Armor\\HN66\\Earrings\\Earrings F HiElf CREOLAS SiL.nif
...data\\meshes\\Armor\\HN66\\Earrings\\Earrings F Orc CLAMPS GoL.nif
...data\\meshes\\Armor\\HN66\\Earrings\\Earrings F Orc CLAMPS SiL ANC.nif
...data\\meshes\\Armor\\HN66\\Earrings\\Earrings F Orc CLAMPS SiL.nif
...data\\meshes\\Armor\\HN66\\Earrings\\Earrings F WoElf CREOLAS GoL.nif
...data\\meshes\\Armor\\HN66\\Earrings\\Earrings F WoElf CREOLAS SiL ANC.nif
...data\\meshes\\Armor\\HN66\\Earrings\\Earrings F WoElf CREOLAS SiL.nif
...data\\meshes\\Armor\\HN66\\Earrings\\Earrings M CLAMPS GoL.nif
...data\\meshes\\Armor\\HN66\\Earrings\\Earrings M CLAMPS SiL ANC.nif
...data\\meshes\\Armor\\HN66\\Earrings\\Earrings M CLAMPS SiL.nif
...data\\meshes\\Armor\\HN66\\Earrings\\Earrings M CREOLAS GoL.nif
...data\\meshes\\Armor\\HN66\\Earrings\\Earrings M CREOLAS SiL ANC.nif
...data\\meshes\\Armor\\HN66\\Earrings\\Earrings M CREOLAS SiL.nif
...data\\meshes\\Armor\\HN66\\Earrings\\Earrings M DaElf CLAMPS GoL.nif
...data\\meshes\\Armor\\HN66\\Earrings\\Earrings M DaElf CLAMPS SiL ANC.nif
...data\\meshes\\Armor\\HN66\\Earrings\\Earrings M DaElf CLAMPS SiL.nif
...data\\meshes\\Armor\\HN66\\Earrings\\Earrings M HiElf CLAMPS GoL.nif
...data\\meshes\\Armor\\HN66\\Earrings\\Earrings M HiElf CLAMPS SiL ANC.nif
...data\\meshes\\Armor\\HN66\\Earrings\\Earrings M HiElf CLAMPS SiL.nif
...data\\meshes\\Armor\\HN66\\Earrings\\Earrings M HiElf CREOLAS GoL.nif
...data\\meshes\\Armor\\HN66\\Earrings\\Earrings M HiElf CREOLAS SiL ANC.nif
...data\\meshes\\Armor\\HN66\\Earrings\\Earrings M HiElf CREOLAS SiL.nif
...data\\meshes\\Armor\\HN66\\Earrings\\Earrings M Orc CLAMPS GoL.nif
...data\\meshes\\Armor\\HN66\\Earrings\\Earrings M Orc CLAMPS SiL ANC.nif
...data\\meshes\\Armor\\HN66\\Earrings\\Earrings M Orc CLAMPS SiL.nif
...data\\meshes\\Armor\\HN66\\Earrings\\Earrings M Orc CREOLAS GoL.nif
...data\\meshes\\Armor\\HN66\\Earrings\\Earrings M Orc CREOLAS SiL ANC.nif
...data\\meshes\\Armor\\HN66\\Earrings\\Earrings M Orc CREOLAS SiL.nif
...data\\meshes\\Armor\\HN66\\Earrings\\Earrings M WoElf CREOLAS GoL.nif
...data\\meshes\\Armor\\HN66\\Earrings\\Earrings M WoElf CREOLAS SiL ANC.nif
...data\\meshes\\Armor\\HN66\\Earrings\\Earrings M WoElf CREOLAS SiL.nif


>> the textures <<
...data\\textures\\Armor\\HN66\\Earrings\\Earrings Crystal_n.dds
...data\\textures\\Armor\\HN66\\Earrings\\Earrings MultiColor3.dds
...data\\textures\\Armor\\HN66\\Earrings\\Earrings MultiColor4.dds
...data\\textures\\Armor\\HN66\\Earrings\\Earrings shine_n.dds
...data\\textures\\cubemaps\\shinycontrast_e.dds

>>>it is important to use EXACTLY the same folder-structure as it is given in the mod-pack !!!<<<
>>>any little mistake in path or a misspelled foldername will result in a non-working mod !!!<<<

4. activate the esp in your launcher.

5. enjoy.


(NOTE: it may seem to you that a few meshes are missing, but everything\'s there, as some meshes are shared by more than one race)


Uninstall
=========
1. Delete the folders associated with the mod.



Incompatibility
===============
everything that massively changes the two named player-homes, will maybe remove or block the chests with the earrings.
But in that case u still have the option of crafting them on a forge, so no problem;


Known Issues or Bugs
====================
none that i know of;


Additional Info
===============
i used the CK\'s bodyslot \'45 - Unnamed\' for the creolas, and \'44 - Unnamed\' for the clamps.


Contact
=======
You can find me on FO3nexus, newvegasnexus & skyrimnexus as Humannature66;

*********************************************************************************
*********************************************************************************

___________________________________________________________________________

if you like this mod, use & enjoy it, or maybe u like to give a kudos;
___________________________________________________________________________

if u need technical help with this, contact me via pm;
___________________________________________________________________________

*********************************************************************************

greetz freddo / Humannature66
